about_the_game:
The Short Story Of A Riftkeeper is a short game about a Riftkeeper, one who is tasked to find and close any open doors in 'the Rifts' to prevent unwanted things from entering the universe.

Throughout a series of trips to 'the Rifts', the protagonist will slowly learn about himself and his background, and why he is doing what he is doing. With a voice coming from a radio as his only companion in this lonely job, he eventually has to face the truth of his story and accept the consequences.


- Collect a variety of items such as torchlights to help you in your journey in the dimly-lit Rifts

- Explore the randomly generated Rifts to close doors, and get out before your sanity hits zero

- Experience short, story-driven levels before ending with an infinite randomly-generated Rifts for players to experience at their own leisure
